attributes.action: put more money into research about rosacea skin problems
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rosacea is a skin disorder that currently affects millions of people in the world but yet to this date there has been not scientific break through to cure the problem.

Rosacea affects mostly women but men are affected more by the disorder. Because of its red-faced, acne-like effects on personal appearance, however, it can cause significant psychological, social and occupational problems if left untreated.

I would like to see more money spent and more tests done to see if we can cure this disorder and make peoples lives free from the misery of rosacea.
